intro: Master strategy, command your army, conquer the battlefield.
description:
ULTIMATE BATTLE SIMULATOR challenges you to master strategy, foresight, and precision placement. Command your army of NPC fighters, manage resources wisely, and outthink your enemies across varied battlefields. Whether you unleash endless ranks or rely on a few elite warriors, victory depends on your ability to plan, deploy, and adapt.

Key Features:
• Tactical Placement – Position units to exploit enemy weaknesses.
• Command from Above – Survey the battlefield from the skies and perfect your formation.
• Flexible Army Management – Add or remove fighters before battle begins.
• Diverse Arsenal – Equip new weapons to strengthen your troops.
• Unique Fighters – Unlock 13 NPC types, from expendable grunts to unstoppable elites.
• Smart Resource Use – Balance quantity versus quality for every fight.
• Expansive Campaign – Conquer 40 stages across 4 unique maps.
• Rising Challenge – Face ever-tougher battles demanding sharper tactics.

From grand clashes to cunning skirmishes, ULTIMATE BATTLE SIMULATOR turns war into a thrilling puzzle of power and precision. The battlefield is waiting — prove your command!
